viewData.name: PhiHair Moisture 200ml
viewData.short_description: PhiHair Moisture is a non-rinse shine boosting hairspray, that instantly softens rough and dry tresses.
viewData.long_description: Your hair is dialy exposed to multiple harsh chemicals, damaging UV rays, chlorine, hard water and other irritants which deeply affect its health and balance. This special moisture barrier formula creates an instant protective film helping the hair stay protected from humidity, uv rays and other kinds of environmental damage that affects its condition. It also locks in hair color, prevents dehydration and combats frizz. The protecting spray formula provides easier hair definition , encourages growth and adds moisture while allowing easier detangling without flaky build-up.
